title: Client crashes
body: Ever since the newest patch my client will crash when it comes up to the load screen. I've lost league points and now I just got a wait put on me bc it says I've abandoned a game. This is starting to get ridiculous I want my lp points back you need to fix this problem!!!!!!!

replies.body: There may be corrupt game files, outdated drivers, or something else entirely that's causing the game to render improperly.  When that happens, your game can end up crashing or result in a bugsplat error.  Our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide has a series of steps that should get you fixed up!  LP is not something that player support has the ability to adjust, even if we wanted to, so the best course to take is resolving whatever is causing these crashes.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Exactly what have happened to me, I have also contacted this terrible customer support, and they did not help for exactly 2 weeks and a half but I won't stop till I get my points or RP instead.

You also can read my story with them. This is my thread.
